price: Sε ne nsa anka ne Wura Nyankopͻn adom no a, anka (ͻkaa bonsu no yεm, nanso N’adom no nti) yεtoo no twenee asaase petee bi so wͻ εberε a na ͻfata soboͻ.
arabic: لَّوۡلَآ أَن تَدَٰرَكَهُۥ نِعۡمَةٞ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ لَنُبِذَ بِٱلۡعَرَآءِ وَهُوَ مَذۡمُومٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: lawlā an tadārakahu niʿ'matun min rabbihi lanubidha bil-ʿarāi wahuwa madhmūmun
translations: surely he would have been thrown
